epics.title: DAT Import + Incremental SQLite Index (CRC32+SHA1, WAL, batch inserts, TB-scale)
epics.body:
## Ziel
Deterministischer SQLite-DAT-Index mit inkrementellem Import und WAL.

## Aufgaben
- [ ] Schema festlegen (rom_hashes, dat_files, indexes)
- [ ] SQLite PRAGMAs (WAL, synchronous=NORMAL, temp_store=MEMORY)
- [ ] Inkrementelle Ingest-Logik (mtime/size/hash)
- [ ] Batch Inserts (10k–100k) + Prepared Statements
- [ ] Dat-Source Tracking + Deactivate/Remove
- [ ] Tests: incremental skip/reindex/remove
- [ ] Doku aktualisieren (DAT_IMPORT_AND_INDEX.md)

epics.title: Lockfile (PID+starttime) + robust recovery + tests
epics.body:
## Ziel
Exklusiver Index-Run via Lockfile (stale detection).

## Aufgaben
- [ ] Lockfile JSON (pid, process_start_time_utc, created_at_utc, hostname, user, index_path)
- [ ] Atomic create + stale takeover
- [ ] psutil bevorzugt, PowerShell fallback
- [ ] Always release (finally)
- [ ] Tests: parallel blocked, stale recovered, PID reuse
